snippet: A call to take an emotionally disturbed man to the hospital ended in a life-threatening injury for Officer Eder Loor, 28, who emerged from surgery in late afternoon.
abstract: A call to take an emotionally disturbed man to the hospital ended in a life-threatening injury for Officer Eder Loor, 28, who emerged from surgery in late afternoon.

byline.original: By JOSEPH GOLDSTEIN and ANDY NEWMAN

headline.main: Police Officer Stabbed in Head in East Harlem
headline.print_headline: An Officer Is Stabbed In the Head In Harlem
